origin.a: I was born in a big fart.
origin.b: I'm from the land of errant wind.
origin.c: I am the child of the air and the earth.

goal.a: When I was younger I fell in love with my own reflection.
goal.b: As a child, I never liked any one else
goal.c: I was always lonely because no one was good enough for me.

obstacle.a: I could make any one fall in love with me but I couldn't fall in love with anyone else.
obstacle.b: I've had a chance with every creature I've met but none has had a chance with me.
obstacle.c: I've never known another creature like I know myself.

reward.a: I have been told there is a portal to another land, a mirror world, where I could find myself.
reward.b: There is a legend of an world below the surface of idtio, like like the veins under our skin.
reward.c: In the bowels of the land of idtio is where I know I'll find love.

origin.a: I came from an ocean of peepee.
origin.b: As an infant I drank in the yellow waters of South Idtio.
origin.c: I come from the acidic land of South Idtio.

goal.a: I'm an idiot who only values beauty.
goal.b: I think the cat is the most beautiful creature in this land but she told the television she doesn't like me.
goal.c: I have been with the most beautiful creatures in the land.

obstacle.a: Is it obvious that I hate myself?
obstacle.b: No one ever seems to remember who I am.

reward.a: If the cat is desperate enough we may be together.
reward.b: I hope to find the creature for me, I just need to know where to look.
reward.c: I won't let go of a creature until I find a new one.

origin.a: I grew up in the dense forest in the east.
origin.b: I'm from the east, where the trees begin and the land ends.
origin.c: When I was younger I lived in the forest and I kind of wish I had never left.

goal.a: I fell in love with the most intelligent but dirty creature.
goal.b: I was always distracted by love.
goal.c: I wanted to build a nest somewhere.

obstacle.a: I don't know if a creature can truly feel love.
obstacle.b: I don't know if two creatures can really know each other.
obstacle.c: I think there's someone else but I don't understand their connection.

reward.a: I want to be the one to discover the void and show my creature the way inside.
reward.b: I don't want to be alone here if they're together.
reward.c: What if I was the only one to find the void?

origin.a: I was born in the south under the shadow of a tropical tree.
origin.b: I'm from the curve in land where the young become old.
origin.c: I grew up in the fragrant south where I never aged.

goal.a: Honestly, I just want to find somewhere that's not lame.
goal.b: I don't care where you're from.
goal.c: I'm so sick of these conversations

obstacle.b: Screw looking for the void or whatever.
obstacle.c: Sorry I wasn't responding to your waves before, it's been such a long day.

reward.a: I'm not gonna go in that void, I don't really care.
reward.c: I have to go but I'll definitely see you later.
